subtitle: I’m ready to be a father!
description: I’m ready to be a father!
title: readyDAD: I’m the man
content:
The closer we get to the birth of our child, the stronger I feel. It is so clear in my mind: I want to care for this child and support it.

I have never looked after anything before – not even my little cousins who were bullied in the schoolyard. I always wished I could help them back then. But now I know I really can help my own child. I feel like I’m becoming a better man!

Being a father will be good for me. It’s reminding me that I do have the power to protect others from danger. I am filled with such happiness when I think of myself as the father and the caregiver. 

I want to be faithful to my wife and to this child. I don’t want to be a father who is only there for the big moments in a child’s life. Or the man who stands up only to discipline the child when it misbehaves. 

I want to be there for every part of this kid’s life. When I think about the job of a father, I cannot think of any other job that could be more important! 

**MAMA HELP: Being a father is a job for life. Even if you are no longer in a relationship with a child’s mother, there are responsibilities. These are to your child. But being a father comes with all the rewards as well. You’ll feel love and pride as your watch your healthy, happy child grow up.**
